docs.snippet: Mike Hazen, who was the assistant G.M. for the Boston Red Sox during their World Series victory in 2013, was named executive vice president and G.M. of the Arizona Diamondbacks on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mike Hazen, who was the assistant G.M. for the Boston Red Sox during their World Series victory in 2013, was named executive vice president and G.M. of the Arizona Diamondbacks on Sunday.

headline.main: Diamondbacks Name Mike Hazen as General Manager
headline.print_headline: Diamondbacks Find a New G.M. in Boston

docs.snippet: Eurosport, Discovery Communications Inc's European sports broadcaster, announced on Monday it has signed a deal to broadcast drone races, joining a number of networks to televise the fledgling sport in which pilots navigate remote-controlled aircr...
docs.lead_paragraph: Eurosport, Discovery Communications Inc's European sports broadcaster, announced on Monday it has signed a deal to broadcast drone races, joining a number of networks to televise the fledgling sport in which pilots navigate remote-controlled aircrafts at high speeds through aerial obstacle courses.

headline.main: Discovery's Eurosport Signs On for Televised Drone Racing
headline.print_headline: Discovery's Eurosport Signs On for Televised Drone Racing

docs.snippet: Nevada's governor signed a bill Monday clearing the way for a Las Vegas stadium that could be home to the Raiders, although NFL owners still need to approve the team's move from Oakland before Sin City becomes a football town....
docs.lead_paragraph: Nevada's governor signed a bill Monday clearing the way for a Las Vegas stadium that could be home to the Raiders, although NFL owners still need to approve the team's move from Oakland before Sin City becomes a football town.

headline.main: Governor Signs Bill Clearing Way for NFL Stadium in Vegas
headline.print_headline: Governor Signs Bill Clearing Way for NFL Stadium in Vegas
